overview:
Barry Flaherty is a leading light in the digital media space, covering all aspects of digital media, mobile, gaming, branding, creative as well as M&A. A regular writer, and event speaker on the Digital circuit in Europe and the Middle East.

As the social media revolution gathers pace, you can rely on Barry being at least three or four steps ahead of most industry leaders - testing out augmented reality apps and embedding their use into a business plan somewhere. Clients have come to rely on his thought leadership and wisdom to steer them through the noise and look at future trends.

What makes working with Barry so great is the fact that he’s one of the most humorous, compassionate, intellectual and energetic people to work with - a true savant!
